I\'m pretty sure there is a reason there probably won\'t be multiplayer, in fact, I know. There are actually many reasons as to why it probably won\'t ever work for KSP.

I\'m pretty sure there is a reason there probably won\'t be multiplayer, in fact, I know. There are actually many reasons as to why it probably won\'t ever work for KSP.

Even if it did work, it would only be easy to play simultaneously with no more than 4-6 other people. I don\'t know how a computer could handle more. Forget anything above 10 people at one given time.
You know that time warp that you use for deep space, orbital, or trans-Munar missions? Without a complex implementation it would require everyone to share a time warp setting.

the devs want mutiplayer, but are not gonna focus on it too much until the game is more feature complete, theres a few posts and topics about this very subject... people are kinda tetchy around it tho, some people love the idea, others just hate it and want to see it die

the devs want mutiplayer...

Check your facts. They\'re uncertain if it\'s feasable even for the last stages of development.

Before this turns into an angerfest I advice everyone to once again listen to this interview.

Interview with HarvesteR: Part 2

Must have completely forgotten about this. I would say, however, that the point of it being unfeasable during KSP\'s development still stands as the idea given is to make an expansion for it, implying KSP itself would be finished.

We\'re still a ways away from that. Time will tell.

The prospect of making a giant orbital station or colonies is so much better when its a joint effort on multiplayer, there\'s a reason why most (if not all) of the best minecraft projects are servers not sp.

If the multiplayer will be something like an addon or mod, someone will use it, others no. Or a deactivation function in menu could be. And about real time multiplayer, could it be that mutiplayer may be in turns for players.
If multiplayer does get implemented, it won\'t be until after EVA\'s, docking, generating fuel, and (hopefully) weapons of some sort are added
